actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the 2-percent floor on miscellaneous itemized deductions for reasonable and incidental expenses related to instruction, teaching, or other educational job-related activities.
short_title: Teacher Deduction for Incidental Expenses Act

summary.text: Teacher Deduction for Incidental Expenses Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the two percent floor on miscellaneous itemized deductions for the qualified expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers (including homeschoolers).

titles.title: Teacher Deduction for Incidental Expenses Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the 2-percent floor on miscellaneous itemized deductions for reasonable and incidental expenses related to instruction, teaching, or other educational job-related activities.
